meanings.definition: A disk used in ice hockey and other games.
meanings.sent1: The hockey players swiftly passed the puck on the ice.
meanings.sent2: The kids played a game of air hockey with a puck.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf tried to juggle a puck, mistaking it for a magical stone.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a puck sliding across the ice.
meanings.sent5: The shiny puck gleamed under the arena lights.

meanings.definition: A small, flat cake of pressed tobacco.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa enjoyed his pipe with a fragrant puck of tobacco.
meanings.sent2: The old sailor carried a puck of tobacco in his pocket.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf tried to hide a puck of tobacco in his shoe.
meanings.sent4: The scent of tobacco puck lingered in the room.
meanings.sent5: She wrinkled her nose at the strong smell of the tobacco puck.

meanings.sent1: The mischievous puck played pranks on the villagers.
meanings.sent2: Legends tell of a mischievous puck who lived in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puck stole all the socks from the laundry line.
meanings.sent4: Her little brother was a puck, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous puck danced under the moonlight, giggling mischievously.
